HediffDef.label: fleshmass ear
HediffDef.description: A cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh. It is more sensitive to sound and allows for noticeably better hearing, and is not subject to degradation or disease.\n\nThe organ has its own neural structures and may become dangerous if removed.

li.letterText: Attempting to remove {PAWN_nameDef}'s fleshmass ear has caused the twisting mass of flesh to attack. The fleshmass has detached from {PAWN_nameDef} and transformed into a fleshbeast!
